title: 没有人会陷入麻烦
content:
[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Reenie+Beanie');
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
#header {background-image: url(http://smlt.wdfiles.com/local--files/plaguebearer%3Anobody/%3F);}
#header h1 a {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 80px 0 25px;
    line-height: 0px;
    max-height: 0px;
    color: transparent;
    background: transparent;
    font-family: BauhausLTDemi. 'Nanum Gothic'. Arial. sans-serif;
    text-decoration: none;
    text-shadow: none;
    letter-spacing: 0.9px;
}
 
#header h1 a::before {
    content: "Nobody";
    color: #fff;
    letter-spacing: -0.02em;
    text-shadow: 3px 3px 5px #000;
}
 
#header h2 span {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 19px 0;
    line-height: 0px;
    max-height: 0px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}
 
#header h2 span::before {
    content: '...';
    color: #fff;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #000;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.8);
}

sup {
  vertical-align: top;
  position: relative;
  top: -0.5em;
}

.scp-image-block.block-right { margin: 1em 2em 1em 1em; }

[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.page {
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
    font-family: "Monotype Corsiva", "Bradley Hand ITC", sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;

   
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-clip: border-box;
    background-color: transparent;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to top ,rgb(202, 219, 228) 0%, rgb(231, 233, 220) 8%);
    background-origin: padding-box;
    background-position: 0px 8px;
    background-repeat: repeat;
    background-size: 100% 20px;
    

    border: 1px solid #CCC;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 10px 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;

    box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)
    }
.page p {
    line-height: 20px;
    margin: 0;
}
[[/module]]
[[div style="border:solid 2px #191c23; background:#2f3442; padding:10px; margin-bottom: 0px;"]]
[[=]]
+ {{//##137f00|chatConnect v3.0##//}}
[[size 80%]]{{//**##137f00|私人连接实用程序**##//}}[[/size]]
[[/=]]
------
[[table style="border: none;"]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: ;eft; font-family: monotype; color:#ffffff;"]]
┌──────────────────────────
»{{//**##d051ff|'n06ody##** 已加入大厅//}}
└──────────────────────────
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
好哇，[[span class="ruby"]]没有人[[span class="rt"]]Nobody[[/span]][[/span]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
哟嚯，没有人
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
发生了什么
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
有什么问题？这电话会议真是非常早
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
简单来说，我有麻烦了
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
 
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
啊，该死
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
你在哪
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
这一点都不好
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
我现在正呆在一家网咖里
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
在宾夕法尼亚州的中部
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
我可以派些人来接你。不管怎么说，之前boat被从伏尔加格勒救了出来
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
那不是我的错 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
呐，这将会有很多麻烦
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
不管怎么说，问题是什么
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
一些南美准军事人员，boat。那是军阀的部队，也许吧？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
大体上来说，我应该还好
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
大体上？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
我想我知道你的意思了，没有人能让我找到张照片
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
所以说，我发现他们在受关注地区四处窥探
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
事实上，更多的是他们在窥探中发现我窥探他们
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
是不是说这与最近发生在宾州的一个异常事故有确切的关联？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
不是巧合吗？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
啊呀，不是个巧合，我可以很肯定的说
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
操。会是亚洲佬走漏消息的吗？我很确定没有人在这里
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
你认为他们会知道他们在找什么东西吗？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
嗯，我十分确定他们会的。他们没有绕多少弯路
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
就像其他军队常常干的 :P
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
你怎么想，boat？关于泛美团体，你似乎比我们知道的更多。
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
不大确定，说实在，窝可能会知道的更多，但没有人能证实我的怀疑
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
sakal，你看起来比平时更焦虑
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
我知道，就是有些紧张。如果我问的问题没有礼貌的话，抱歉
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
我明白。你只是想要确保我还好。多谢
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
等等，我想我找到他们了 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
草他娘的图片下载不了，等等几分钟
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
    
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
继续吧，他们抓住你后发生了什么？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
那家伙对我大喊大叫
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
不知道说的是葡萄牙语还是西班牙语
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
基本上我定住他后再偷走了他的摩托车
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
草他的我从那里跑了出来后就结束了
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
找到一张新图片
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
你知道那个家伙怎么喊你？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
真母鸡啊。一般大都是“你是谁，来这里干嘛？”之类的。
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
知了。他们看起来是这样吗：##6098ff|los_cotizantes1979.jpg##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
天杀的，确实像。真棒，就和往常一样棒，boat。
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
他们是谁？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
谢谢。他们自称是[[span class="ruby"]]“奉献者”[[span class="rt"]]Los Cotizantes[[/span]][[/span]]，一个阿根廷准军事组织。
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
就像是阿根廷版的UIU，但不是政府组织。
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
哦，多谢，天哪。至少我知道它不是葡萄牙的
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
葡萄牙语在那里不是官方语言，对吧？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
是呀，他们说西班牙语
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
操
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
他们在街对面外
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
我认为他们看见了摩托车
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
你能跑得出来吗？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
你可以处理好他们，吧
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
都很渺茫。但窝会试试
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
操他们正鸡儿来这
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
伙计们帮我个芒
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
当然，如何？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
我们都站你一边
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
窝要肝驱动器擦除器
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
包村这鞋子稳健： ##6098ff|dsc001.zip##, ##6098ff|dsc002.zip##, ##6098ff|dsc003.zip##, ##6098ff|dsc004.zip##, ##6098ff|dsc005.zip##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ff1e1e;"]]
<sakaali>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
下载中，它们真大
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
也在下载中。这些文件是什么？
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
<'n06ody>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
辈分驱动不要丢掉tamen
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#d051ff;"]]
@@@@
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
boot，窝有鸽文体
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
  
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#c6c900;"]]
<einBoot>
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; font-family: "Verdana"; color:#ffffff;"]]
啊呀？
